#summary Windows API function to get the last error code generated in the calling thread.
#labels Phase-Implementation,Win32-API

= Introduction =

The GetLastError() function returns the value of the last error caused by the calling thread. The last-error code is maintained on a per-thread basis.

= Synopsis =

DWORD WINAPI GetLastError(*void*);

= Description =

== Parameters ==

This function takes no parameters.

== Return Value ==

This function returns the last error that occurred in this thread, as set by *`SetLastError`*(). Note that some functions will call *`SetLastError`*() with a value of zero on success, overwriting the last error.
